summary: This is an email from an FBI agent to Assistant US Attorneys (AUSAs) on July 9, 2019, forwarding an edited version of a document titled 'Hotline_Tracker_2PM_7.9.2019.xlsx'. The email indicates ongoing case management and information sharing between law enforcement and prosecutors.

events.title: Hotline Tracker Update Shared with Prosecutors
events.description: An FBI agent sends an edited version of a 'Hotline Tracker' spreadsheet to Assistant US Attorneys, indicating active information collection and case coordination.

keyFacts: An FBI agent communicated with Assistant US Attorneys (AUSAs) on July 9, 2019, regarding the Epstein investigation.
The communication involved sharing an edited document titled 'Hotline_Tracker_2PM_7.9.2019.xlsx'.
The subject 'Hotline_Tracker' suggests the existence of a tip line or hotline for receiving information related to the case.
The email indicates active case management and information flow between investigators and prosecutors in July 2019.
The document is a piece of internal correspondence showing procedural aspects of the investigation.
